citation.title: Semantics of context-free languages.
citation.rawString: KNUTH, D. E. (1968). Semantics of context-free languages. Mathematical Systems Theory, 2(2):127–145. SHIEBER, S. M. (1984). The design of a computer language for linguistic information. In Proceedings of the Tenth International Conference on Computational Linguistics, pages 362–366, Stanford University, Stanford, California.

citation.title: Par propriétés globales, j’entends par exemple celles qui ne sont pas sujettes à la variation.
